languages.text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Всякий раз, когда враг совершает атаку по возможности против владельца этого амулета, этот враг должен пройти проверку Ловкости или получить эффект Ослеплен на 1 ход.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 turn.

Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Когда враг совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g} против владельца этого амулета, этот враг выполняет проверку Ловкости и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплен{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.
每当装备者遭到{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}时，都会使攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者遭到{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}时，都会使攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}一回合。

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}のターゲットになると、攻撃者は1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 自身が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を受ける度、相手に1ターンの間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}効果を付与。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador es objetivo de un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, su atacante queda {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador es objetivo de un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, su atacante queda {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 1 turno.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger Ziel eines {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffs{/g} ist, wird der Angreifer 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger Ziel eines {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffs{/g} ist, wird der Angreifer 1 Zug lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, l'attaquant subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, l'attaquant subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 1 tour.
